item.title: Trump commutes prison sentence of ex-GOP Rep. George Santos
item.description: Trump said he began thinking about Santos after being reminded of a controversy about Democratic Sen. Richard Blumenthal's military service claims.

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to allow Illinois troop deployment
item.description: The Justice Department filed an emergency request asking the court to block a judge's ruling halting the deployment of hundreds of troops in the Chica...

item.title: Army Corps of Engineers pausing $11 billion in projects over shutdown, Trump budget chief says
item.description: President Donald Trump and OMB Director Russell Vought have described the government shutdown as an "opportunity" to slash the federal bureaucracy.

item.title: Democrats' distrust of Trump keeps them from forming 'gang' to negotiate government shutdown
item.description: Trump and GOP leaders John Thune and Mike Johnson have conditioned health-care negotiations on reopening the government first.

item.title: UK Finance Minister Rachel Reeves: November budget will respond to the global challenges we face
item.description: U.K. Chancellor Rachel Reeves cited the Russia-Ukraine conflict, the tensions in the Middle East, and the impact of global trade barriers as key chall...
